title: The Secret to Getting It Across
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>So I just need to read the lines from this script, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yes, please do! It’s a scene between a young girl aiming to be a dancer and an older girl who is a professional dancer. Alright, I’ll start, okay.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>“Onee-sama, how can I dance as perfectly as you do?”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>“Dancing is all about passion. If you don’t put your feelings into your dance, they won’t reach your partner either.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>“But, how should I....”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>“Isn’t it obvious, feel as you dance. That’s all.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>....Okay, that’s it! You’re amazing, Nico-san!! I can’t believe you were able to do a script you saw just now that well.... It was very convincing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>....Well, that’s because these lines are what Nico always believes in. It’s the same for school idols. Nico puts my feelings into every aspect of the performance, not just dancing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I see....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Fufu, it’s just like the lines say. It’s because my feelings are in these lines. Of course Nico would be convincing, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
